attributes.action: Law changes for child killers child rapest and paedophiles.
attributes.background: Child killers child rapest and paedophiles don't get enough time served. It need to be longer and some get let off with their crimes some thing needs to be done.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
